channel.title: and Jim Webber on World Wide Webber
channel.description: Recent content in and Jim Webber on World Wide Webber

item.title: Knowledge Graphs
item.description: A short introduction to Knowledge Graphs for CIOs, CDOs, and data managers.

item.title: Design and Evalution of an Edge-based Concurrency Protocol for Distributed Graph Databases
item.description: A novel concurrency control mechanism for distributed graph databases that aborts any transaction that could introduce inconsistencies, along with peformance evaluation

item.title: Investigations on path indexing for graph databases
item.description: Results of an investigation into path indexing for graph databases.

item.title: Secure and Provable Service Support for Human-Intensive Real-Estate Processes
item.description: A realistic workflow appliation for real-estate using SSDL to reason about correctness of multiparty protocols over the Internet.

item.title: Grid Computing using Web Services Technologies
item.description: Showing how large-scale Grid computing designed as a service-oriented architecture and implemented by standard Web Services.

item.title: Coordinating Business Transactions on the Web
item.description: An overview of the OASIS Business Transactions Protocol for reaching agreement on the Internet.
